meanings.definition: The upper or outer curve of an arch.
meanings.sent1: The extradoses of the bridge were beautifully designed.
meanings.sent2: Architects carefully study the extradoses when designing arches.
meanings.sent3: The extradoses of the arch giggled as they reached for the sky.
meanings.sent4: The extradoses of the arch stood proudly like a crown above the structure.
meanings.sent5: The extradoses of the arch gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their elegant curve.

meanings.sent1: We counted the extradoses of the arches in the cathedral.
meanings.sent2: The extradoses of the old bridges were in need of repair.
meanings.sent3: The extradoses of the arches threw a party to celebrate their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: The extradoses of the bridges linked together like a chain of strength.
meanings.sent5: The extradoses of the structures added a touch of grandeur to the cityscape.
